name: Fruit Legacy
description:
A game for your relaxation, where you cut falling fruits in time with your kitchen knife, but the difficulty is that each fruit needs a special knife, and in addition to fruits, bombs also fall, hitting which you will lose. The game becomes more difficult with each level with mutating fruits!

Fruit Legacy - A click-and-click game where the player, by choosing a certain color of the knife, must cut falling fruit, avoid hitting bombs and accumulate power-ups that allow the player to progress through the level. Fruits have the ability to mutate into new variations, where they are combined into several pieces.

Game Features:
- Relaxation
- Pleasant Decoration
- Music
- Increasing Difficulty
